functions.title: BOE Vol 11
pages:
§lAqua Affinity:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a block of prismarine (P), a sea lantern (S), and a nautilus shell (N) as reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
PSN§r

§lDepth Strider II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a dead fire coral (R) and prismarine crystals (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R r§r

§lDepth Strider III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of kelp (K), a prismarine shard (S) and a pufferfish (P) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a line of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
KSP§r

§lRespiration II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use some seagrass (R) and an ink sac (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R r§r

§lRespiration III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a dead bubble coral (K), a glow ink sac (S) and a dead tube coral (P) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a line of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
KSP§r
